head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths HARRIS, SAMUEL JAY

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths HARRIS, SAMUEL JAY

block.p: HARRIS-Samuel Jay. April 12, 2002. Beloved husband of Pearl (nee Werthman) of Cherry Hill. Loving father of Jennifer (Robert) Herstine, Jane (Vincent) Firth and Ruth (Harry) Friedberg. Beloved grandfather of Holly Plummer, Jennifer (Michael) Rafael, Dana Rosen, Lauren Diamond, David Diamond and Jocelyn Firth. Dear uncle of Marjorie and Charles Zuckerman. Great-uncle of Stephanie Rubin and Amanda Zuckerman. Sam was a graduate of the Univeristy of Florida Gainsville 1934 and MIT 1936. Platt Memorial Chapels, Inc., Cherry Hill, NJ.
